name: part_007
file: tmp_【#尾丸ポルカ一周年】エッ！？1時間でガチの即興曲を！？いい話もあるよ！【3DLIVE】 [as7iNw5gSi8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Suspect'. Omaru Polka sings while Zain-kun plays the keyboard.
MC section. Omaru Polka talks to the audience and Zain-kun, reflecting on the performance and introducing the next song.

subtitles.original: 一秒でも...
subtitles.english: Even for a second...

subtitles.original: どこかの誰かに仕組まれていても
subtitles.english: Even if it was orchestrated by someone, somewhere

subtitles.original: 最後に笑う君と
subtitles.english: With you, who laughs at the end

subtitles.original: さあ、速攻して
subtitles.english: Now, act quickly

subtitles.original: 二人の鼓動
subtitles.english: The heartbeat of the two of us

subtitles.original: 新見世は次のステージへ
subtitles.english: The new performance moves to the next stage

subtitles.original: Oh... Yeah... Ah...
subtitles.english: Oh... Yeah... Ah...

subtitles.original: パッ！ タッタララタリララタリラリラッ
subtitles.english: Pa! Tattararatariraratatarirarira!

subtitles.original: はぁ... はぁ... タッタララタリラリラ...
subtitles.english: Huff... huff... Tattararatarirarira...

subtitles.original: はぁ... うまく歌えませんでしたー！
subtitles.english: Huff... I couldn't sing it well!

subtitles.original: サスペクト、ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you for 'Suspect'!

subtitles.original: 先輩コーラスありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Sempais, thank you for the chorus!

subtitles.original: この曲、めっちゃ好き！
subtitles.english: I really love this song!

subtitles.original: すげー練習した！
subtitles.english: I practiced it so much!

subtitles.original: はぁ... 歌枠でも多分歌った...
subtitles.english: Huff... I probably sang it in a karaoke stream too...

subtitles.original: 練習してる... すげー練習した曲と...
subtitles.english: The songs I've practiced... The ones I practiced a lot and...

subtitles.original: 練習があまりできていない曲のあれが顕著に出て... 出て... 出ている
subtitles.english: ...the ones I haven't practiced much, the difference between them shows clearly.

subtitles.original: どうだい、君？ 良かった？ 良かった？
subtitles.english: How was it for you? Was it good? Was it good?

subtitles.original: サスペクトしてた？ サササッしてたね、みんな
subtitles.english: Were you 'Suspect'-ing? You were all 'sasasa'-ing, weren't you?

subtitles.original: サスサスしとるね、おぉ...
subtitles.english: You're 'sasusasu'-ing, oh...

subtitles.original: いや、ちょっと待って。大丈夫。ちょっと待って、大丈夫...
subtitles.english: No, wait a second. It's okay. Just a moment, it's fine...

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、今頑張って多分ね、あの... 作ってると思うから、ちょっとね...
subtitles.english: It's okay, they're probably working hard right now to create it, so just a bit...

subtitles.original: はぁ... 頑張ったー。座員ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Huff... I worked hard. Thank you, Zain-kun.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、このままで次の曲も、実はあるんですよ。ちょっと水飲むわ。
subtitles.english: Actually, there's another song after this. I'm going to drink some water.

subtitles.original: 座員くん、よろしく。
subtitles.english: Zain-kun, please take over for a bit.

subtitles.original: おーい、よし。ありがとう、座員くん。
subtitles.english: Oi, okay. Thank you, Zain-kun.

subtitles.original: はい、ただいま。ただいま。
subtitles.english: Yes, I'm back. I'm back.

subtitles.original: あ、おかえりって言ってる。すごーい！
subtitles.english: Ah, you're saying 'Welcome back'. Amazing!

subtitles.original: 意思の疎通が図れた！
subtitles.english: We were able to communicate!

subtitles.original: というわけで、えーと、次の曲、歌いたいですが、えーと、これは...
subtitles.english: And so, um, I want to sing the next song, but, um, this is...

subtitles.original: いや、言っとけよって話なんだけど...
subtitles.english: Well, it's a case of 'you should have said so sooner'...

subtitles.original: えーと、まぁ、この曲を一人で歌うのは、最後にしよう、したいなと思っている曲です。
subtitles.english: Um, well, this is a song that I want to make the last time I sing it alone.

subtitles.original: なぜむしろ逆に、ここに来るまでのこのね、ねぽらぼ1周年と書いてあるこの出発は...
subtitles.english: Why, on the contrary, until coming here, for this starting point with 'Nepolabo 1st Anniversary' written on it...

subtitles.original: 歌っていないのだろうかっていうのが、ちょっとね、あの、不思議なくらいなんですけど...
subtitles.english: ...why haven't we sung it? It's almost strange, but...

subtitles.original: いろんな理由とかいろんなことが忙しかったりとかして、4人で歌うことが叶わなかったんだけど...
subtitles.english: Due to various reasons and being busy with many things, it wasn't possible for the four of us to sing it together...

subtitles.original: ポルカ一人で今日は最後、歌ってやるぜ、これを！っていう曲で行きます。
subtitles.english: But today, Polka is going to sing it alone for the last time! That's the song we're going with.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。そう！ そう！ ナイス！ もう一回言って！ お？
subtitles.english: Thank you. Yes! Yes! Nice! Say it again! Oh?

subtitles.original: ん？ その手拍子は何個かい？
subtitles.english: Hmm? How many handclaps was that?

subtitles.original: いいね、3つなんだね。わかった。3つらしいです、手拍子は。
subtitles.english: Nice, it's three. Got it. Apparently, it's three claps.

subtitles.original: そう、必要なのは手だけで大丈夫！ 行くよ！ じゃあ、歌わせてください！
subtitles.english: Yes, all you need are your hands! Here we go! Well then, please let me sing!

subtitles.original: 『BLUE CLAPPER』
subtitles.english: 'BLUE CLAPPER'

subtitles.original: 手を上げて Clap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, all the way across the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, I hope it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら、一緒にさあ！
subtitles.english: Come on, let's do it together!

subtitles.original: Everybody clap your hands 空の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Everybody clap your hands, all the way across the sky

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 響きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, I hope it resonates

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 光射す僕たちの未来 行くぞ！ コールしろ！
subtitles.english: To our future where the light shines. Let's go! Give me a call!

subtitles.original: カンパイはよろしくな！
subtitles.english: Take care of the cheers!

subtitles.original: Three! Two! One! 行くぞ！
subtitles.english: Three! Two! One! Let's go!

subtitles.original: Holo-Life with stars 始めようか Starting message 未来的な Timing
subtitles.english: Holo-Life with stars, shall we begin? Starting message, future-like timing

subtitles.original: あの姿みたいに Swimming swimming
subtitles.english: Like that figure, swimming, swimming

subtitles.original: 引き寄せるよ Rising まだ見えない May be
subtitles.english: Drawing it in, rising, still invisible, maybe

subtitles.original: この先には何があるの？
subtitles.english: What lies ahead?

subtitles.original: まだ早いよ Next 追いつくまで Checking
subtitles.english: It's still too early, next, checking until I catch up

subtitles.original: でもたまに止まって Thinking thinking
subtitles.english: But sometimes I stop and think, thinking, thinking

subtitles.original: 変えて見せる景色 踏み出すのさ Starting 掴んでみせるよ キラキラマイデイ
subtitles.english: The scenery I'll show you changed, I'm stepping out, starting, I'll grab it, my sparkly day

subtitles.original: 叶う日まで Sorry つなぎたいから
subtitles.english: Until the day it comes true, sorry, because I want to connect

subtitles.original: だって君に ずっと見てほしいから
subtitles.english: Because I want you to keep watching me

subtitles.original: 手を上げて Clap your hands 海の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Raise your hands, clap your hands, all the way across the sea

subtitles.original: Clap your hands 届きますように
subtitles.english: Clap your hands, I hope it reaches you

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: ほら、一緒に！ Everybody clap your hands
subtitles.english: Come on, together! Everybody clap your hands

subtitles.original: 空の向こうまで Clap your hands
subtitles.english: All the way across the sky, clap your hands

subtitles.original: 響きますように 手を叩こう
subtitles.english: I hope it resonates, let's clap our hands

subtitles.original: 手を叩こう 光射す僕たちの未来
subtitles.english: Let's clap our hands, to our future where the light shines
